description.bot: I need {permissions} to execute this command.
description.user: You must have these {permissions} to be able use this command.

command.no_run_function: The prefix version of this command isn't completed yet. Use the slash version instead.
command.command_disabled: This command is disabled by the _bot owner_ or _developers_.
command.dev_command: This command is only accessible to _the bot owner_ & _developers_.
command.guild_only: This command can only be used in a guild _(Discord Server)_.
command.cooldown: Chill! Command in on cooldown wait for `{cooldown}` to use the command again.
command.voice_channel_only: You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
